name: We Eat Money - 3D poem
description: This poem is a result of my visits to the nearby farm where I saw the animals eating grass all day and thought of the privilage of being human. In this series I weave together sound, poetry and VR art that I create. It's a carpet of creative expression - a deeply satisfying experience, where each stage has its own play and rhythm. As if the year has gone through the seasons. The poems are captured in moments of insights about different aspects of life. And then the art is created as an illusrtation to it and further the music. Watch full resolution collector video here as an unlisted video: https://youtu.be/khmxygqXnAk
